mapper.select: select r.ROLE_ID as roleId, r.ROLE_NAME as roleName, r.SORT_NO as sortNo, r.REMARK as remark from t_sys_role r join t_sys_role_user ru on r.role_id = ru.role_id where ru.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT '1' AS permissionType, M.MENU_ID AS menuOrFuncId, M.MENU_URL AS menuUrl, M.MENU_PERMISSIONS AS menuPermissions, '' funcMenuId, '' funcPermissions FROM T_SYS_MENU M UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS permissionType, F.FUNC_ID AS menuOrFuncId, '' AS menuUrl, '' AS menuPermissions, F.MENU_ID funcMenuId, F.FUNC_PERMISSIONS AS funcPermissions FROM T_SYS_FUNC F

select a.ROLE_PERMISSION_ID as rolePermissionId, a.ROLE_ID as roleId, a.PERMISSION_TYPE as permissionType, a.MENU_OR_FUNC_ID as menuOrFuncId, m.MENU_URL as menuUrl, m.MENU_PERMISSIONS AS menuPermissions, f.MENU_ID funcMenuId, f.FUNC_PERMISSIONS AS funcPermissions from T_SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION a left join t_sys_menu m ON m.MENU_ID=a.MENU_OR_FUNC_ID left join t_sys_func f on f.FUNC_ID=a.MENU_OR_FUNC_ID where a.ROLE_ID=#{roleId}
